column4: hello everyone. i was having trouble running fsck on 9.10. i unmounted the drive i wanted to check, which is my only hd, but fsck still says that it is mounted
You can't access fsck from the single-user menu, anymore.
If you want to run an fsck you have do:  touch /forcefsck    then reboot.  (Please correct me if this is wrong, people.
That's how I had to do it on my laptop running 9.10.
There's an entire thread dedicated to this somewhere, which where I got the general info.  I got the command advice here,though.
thanks, i am giving it a try now then. it seems as if it is working. thanks a bunch
